idea-plugin.name: MoveFaster
idea-plugin.description: Install to navigate lines 5 times faster. search for 'MoveFaster' in Settings/Keymaps and register your keybindings and you are good to go! (ALT+UP, ALT+DOWN Default) source code can be found at: https://github.com/Kooni-Boop/MoveFast-Jetbrains-IDE-Plugin
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• 0.41 - Compatability fixes.
  • 0.4 - IntelliJ 2021 Platform compatibility support, added move with selection feature.
  • 0.3 - Initial release.

action.description: Move cursor up by defined in MoveFaster settings.
Move cursor up by defined in MoveFaster settings.
Move cursor down by defined in MoveFaster settings.
Move cursor down by defined in MoveFaster settings.
